type.name: org.gradle.testing.jacoco.plugins.JacocoPluginExtension
type.description: Extension including common properties and methods for Jacoco.

method.name: applyTo
method.description:
Applies Jacoco to the given task. Configuration options will be provided on a task extension named 'jacoco'. Jacoco will be run as an agent during the execution of the task.
param:task the task to apply Jacoco to. (see JacocoPluginExtension#TASK_EXTENSION_NAME)

method.name: applyTo
method.description:
Applies Jacoco to all of the given tasks.
param:tasks the tasks to apply Jacoco to

method.name: getLogger
method.description: Logger @deprecated logger should be considered final.

method.name: getReportsDir
method.description: The directory where reports will be generated.

method.name: getToolVersion
method.description: Version of Jacoco JARs to use.

method.name: setLogger
method.description: Logger @deprecated logger should be considered final.

property.name: logger
property.description: Logger @deprecated logger should be considered final.

property.name: reportsDir
property.description: The directory where reports will be generated.

property.name: toolVersion
property.description: Version of Jacoco JARs to use.
